name: 彭朋群
objective:
這門課程主要是討論人工智慧 (AI) 的理論基礎與相關應用，課程內容包含：1. AI 問題的解題方法（搜尋技巧） 2. 知識表示的方法 3. AI 程式語言：LISP 與 PROLOG  4. 推論方法 5. 進階研究主題
This course provides a thorough discussion of AI's theoretical foundations and advanced applications. These are the following : 1. the fundamentals of problem solving (search algorithm) 2. knowledge representation 3. AI algorithms and data structure in LISP and PROLOG 4. algorithms for reasoning 5. advanced topics for AI problem solving
schedule: 1. the fundamentals of problem solving (search algorithm) 2. knowledge representation 3. AI algorithms and programming basics 4. algorithms for reasoning 5. advanced topics for AI problem solving
materials: Francois Chollet, “Deep Learning with Python, 2nd Edition” Manning, 2021
